review_content: 13 months in a bottle)) There is little raspberry in the aroma, hints of mash, which is reminiscent of Salvator, a light spice. Taste. the body is dense (compote) and soft, wheat, sugar, raspberry notes. Very strange .. I must try fresh.

Sample from 25 cl. bottle. Slightly hazy reddish amber colour with a dense pink head. Sweet aroma with raspberries, wheat malts and lemons. Taste is sweet. Light to medium bodied. Sweet finish with raspberries. Ok, if you like sweet drinks.
De color rojizo con una fina espuma de baja retención. Cuerpo ligero y baja carbonatación. Aroma a frambuesa y almíbar. En boca es dulce, con una ligera acidez.
Old rating from 2014 - 250ml bottle, pours red with a off white head. Aromas & tastes of raspberries, coriander & wheat. Moderate body. Sweet finish
Smak av solmogna hallon. Söt och fruktig med låg alkoholhalt. Ett bra sommaröl om man gillar läsk.
Cerveza con frambuesas y mucho quimico. El sabor es totalmente artificial. Podría mejorar

elég erősen raspberryivel átitatott éjszaka volt ez.
a sör meg olyan ídes, hogy megtudtam hogy lehet az embernek eccerre szorulása meg hasmenése is...

Bottle @ Wordenskjolds. Appearance: pours clear red with good pink soapy head and lacing. aroma/taste: wheat, berries, sugar, raspberries and light spicy notes. palette: medium berry aroma, average carbonation, light to medium body, medium to notable sweetness, unbalanced by a light bitterness and acidity, average duration, sweet finish and a watery texture. Overall: extremely sweet fruity ale
Clear, ruby-rose color and a white head. Quite sweet with nice raspberrys and coriander taste.

Sweet aroma of raspberry
Flavour is raspberry, wheat (almost flourish)
Small, soft bubbles.
Rosée prezintă un miros dulce  de zmeură şi grîu. Gust artificial de intens de zmeură cu nuanţe de malţ şi sirop. Uşor acru la post gust.
Rose wine colour with a small foam (too small). Sweet taste of raspberries, a little artificial. Refreshing taste of raspberries and a hint wheat. Should be enjoyed cold.

Aroma of sweet raspberry with slight wheat and malt notes
Looks like a rose, with slight orange tint. Very small head
Slight carbonation with oily mouthfeel
Very refreshing

Aroma: Fruity sweet with berries. 
Flavour: Sweet berries with sugar. 
Colour: Pink with a fading head.

Bottle @ Wordenskjolds. Appearance: pours clear red with good pink soapy head and lacing. aroma/taste: wheat, berries, sugar, raspberries and light spicy notes. palette: medium berry aroma, average carbonation, light to medium body, medium to notable…

Sweet aroma of raspberry Flavour is raspberry, wheat (almost flourish)…
Rosée prezintă un miros dulce  de zmeură şi grîu. Gust artificial de intens de zmeură cu nuanţe de malţ şi sirop. Uşor acru la post gust.
Rose wine colour with a small foam (too small). Sweet taste of raspberries, a little artificial. Refreshing taste of raspberries and a hint wheat. Should be enjoyed cold.
Aroma of sweet raspberry with slight wheat and malt notes Looks like a rose, with slight orange tint. Very small head…

Adding in my old ticks because I want to see how they impact my stats and some of them I will never see again. Will however re-rate them when practical. A mate bought a box of this but it pretty much all got wasted because we all found it to be quite minging.
Aroma: Fruity sweet with berries. Flavour: Sweet berries with sugar. Colour: Pink with a fading head.…
Uklar rosa med rosa skum. Aroma bringebær. Smak Bringebærdrops, fruktkaramell, malt. Kremet og fin fylde, lett syrlig, balansert. Delt med DjOeye på Hamna og Bier.

Aroma; raspberry candies, tart malt, caramel note. Look; pink head on hazy rose body. Taste; raspberry, caramel, syrup, tart, n finishes sweet n raspberrish. Feel; light body n ok co². Overall; it`s light drink. [ btl @ Hamna&Bier Tromsø]
0.25 l bottle from K-Citymarket Ruoholahti, Helsinki. Red, cloudy. Raspberry soft drink. Nice taste of the fruit, but no traces of wheat beer or beer.

Smell-weak raspberry notes.
Foam- thin, sweet, raspberry, juice, weak sour notes. Head seems medium-sized, pink color. Sticks.
Appearance- simple bottle, but unique beer bottle cap. Weak haziness, orange-pink color, weak carbonation.
From - pint glass
Taste - sweetness, sugar, raspberry, juice. Very light, sweet and quite refreshing.
It's not the tastiest fruit beer I've had, even for the strength. It's solid though and has a pleasant fresh taste. Very guzzleable.

Cloudy reddish pink with foamy pinkish white head
Aroma is fruity (berries) and grainy 
Flava is sweet notes of raspberries 
Feels light silky with mild fizz
Finishes sweet sticky
Une classique de l'été, à boire impérativement fraîche, avec une couleur framboise et une bouche relativement discrète, un peu écœurante par l'aspect un peu trop sucré.
Raspberry tasted wheat beer. Pinky outfit. Disappearing foam. Weak taste for it's price. But drinkable beer.
Taste like fruit soda not beer and feel disappointed for hoegaarden. Really confused when I saw concentrated carrot juice in the ingredients.
It resembles wine on so many levels. It tastes awesome for a rose beer. It might be my first, but I would be fine if it were my last.
Dark pink appearance with a light pink, fast dissipating head. Smell of raspberries and yeast. Sweet raspberry taste with a very weak beer note. Raspberry aftertaste. Weak body.

Small 250 ml bottle. Strong Raspberry smell, and pretty good actually, not like soda like with some of these beers. Red color , low head and sediments! Pretty cool for a mass produced beer. Taste is dissapointing sadly, i really wanted to like this, but like with a lot of fruit beers, it tastes like soda and not in a blended fruit-beer. I'll stick to Kriek, thanks
W zasadzie smakuje po prostu jak przyzwoite piwo z syropem, jest w porządku, nawet nie przesłodzone.

Bottle 0.25L.
Hazy light red body with an average, frothy, pink head, mostly lasting with some lacing.
Light malty (grains) with strong fruity notes.
Heavy sweet (too heavy) flavour; average-lasting sweet finish.
Light-to-medium body with watery texture; soft carbonation.

Color rosa tirando a rojo, elevada turbidez. Un dedo de espuma rosa con buena retención. Aroma a mermelada de frutos rojos. Gusto dulce, chuchería de frambuesa, un punto de trigo y de acidez al final del trago. Cuerpo medio. Nada del otro mundo, un Shandy Witt de frambuesa, fácil de beber si te va el rollete y buena elección si hace calor.

0.25 l bottle from France. Huge thanks Višnja 666 and Pilot Goran for sharing and PH for bringing it. Hazy pinkish orange. Small off-white head. Aroma is fake sugary fruity candy. Balance. Fruity, candy, ice cream, tart red fruit. Watery, light body, light finish. Very dull

Bottled 0,25L. Pale reddish/amber color, light bubbly and limpid aspect with escaping pink head. Light artificial fruity and candy aroma. Sugary and light sour taste, candy and chewingun flavor with unconstitant watery final.
An excellent alternative to more expensive framboise, with a wheat beer flavor and fruity overtones. At heart remains true to a hoegaarten flavor with a light and sweet addition
Pink with a pinkish white head. Smell is raspberry, jam, soda. The taste is like a sweet raspberry soda with hints of weissbier. Good alternative to expensive bar juices.
0.25 L bottle. Pink color. Beer sweet taste with a pronounced taste and aroma of raspberry.
Cerveza ligera de bajo nivel de alcohol. Bebida muy aromática, notas profundas a berries. Buen nivel de espuma.

Różowa barwa, klarowne. Piana biała, niezbyt wysoka.
Nos: maliny, słody, karmel
Paszcza: bardzo słodkie, średnie wysycenie, na finiszu minimalna goryczka.
Generalnie zbyt słodko. Jakby do lagera dolać zbyt dużo soku malinowego.
Tap. Pink, muddy, white-pink foam. Aroma: raspberry strongly and sweetly, reminds raspberry jam. Taste: sweet, raspberry jam, fresh raspberry, wheat, sweetie beer for dessert.
33cl can from beerhawk. Pink appearance. Aroma is raspberry. Flavour is sweet and fruity.
Kedves, kellemes, lágy, karakteres málna ízesítéssel. Nem erős, üdítős, iszogatós - főleg - lánysör.
Not actively horrible but tastes of over sweet, fizzy Ribena rather than beer. Not for me.

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega kirjutan igale õllele selle sama teksti. Hindamiseks teen vaid ticki.
V mestskom hostinci Trencin. Podla mna malinovo jahodova vona. Jahodova kalna farbs pena svetloruzova. Sladkasta svieza jahodovomalinova chut. Na konci chut neostava.

From Cerveza Belga, Almuñecar. In Teku glass. At lunch. With fries with eggs + chicken steaks. Good option when in the mood of a raspberry drink, even wife liked it. No trace of alcohol. Its more like a refreshment than a beer. Smooth body. Pleasant.
Bottle pour shared by Lutton. Thanks! Pink pour that matches the secondary label coloring. Very rich, raspberry jam. Candy sweet. Raspberry mambas. Sugary finish. Unique. Pretty interesting for sure.

Bottle in Bellingham. Thanks Andrew for getting this at Incheon for us. Pinkish white head, lightly cloudy wheat with ugly pinkish red color. Cherry-strawberry jam nose with weak wheat creaminess. Chewy, incredibly sweet, jammy. White pepper back end. Terrible.
Strange aroma of herbs & raspberry. Hazy red & a low white head. Medium sweet fruity taste. Medium body, creamy texture, soft carbonation, with a sticky sugar feeling.
Ocena wystawiona podczas degustacji, lecz  utraciłem notatki z opisem wrażeń :(
Bottle from supermarket. Rose color, white head. Sweet taste with raspberry, tart, wheat and grass. Sweet finish with raspberry, tart, wheat and grass. Drinkable.

Prekrasan i fantastican miris maline...lijepa rubinska boja,malo slabija pjena...jako lijep izgled i odlican okus...dosta slatkast ali izuzetno fino...kupljeno u Nagykaniszi,nazalost jos ju nisam nasao u HR. Pitko i fino jednom rjecju izvrsno !

Bottle, 330 ml. Oh my god! Waaaay too sweet for my taste. The raspberry flavour is dominant, combined with the sweet wheat-style is way too much for my palate. Not the one i will drink again. This is for those (mainly girls), who are not really (beer)drinkers, but want to go out with friend and drink this all night long.

Earlier Rating: 6/3/2018 Total Score: 4.5
Earlier Rating: 6/3/2018 Total Score: 5
Sometimes you have a beer, that simply isn’t as good as another beer. Try mcouffe cherry beer. NOW.
Very sweet. Genuine taste of both raspberry and wheat beer. A bit acidic on the teeth after.
Flaska z tesca. Vona malinova. Farba ruzovkasta. Chut malinova, sladkasta.

Visual: (cellared for 5 years). 4-pack aluminum cans. Pours clear rosé pink with a light shade of brown, fine ringed retention, a few bubbles surfacing.



Nose: berry nuanced light malt, slight cloying foreshadowing. (lvl-4)-pungency



Attack: crisp bite, fruity-sweet



Mid-palate: light burpy, generic soda-esqe raspberry-strawberry, (lvl-5-sweetness)



Finish: artificial sweetener roughness, slight residual jammy fruity



Summary: Basic and drinkable, more of a party drink to wash down potluck food. You'll get a buzz while chowing down that food to get rid of that artificial sweetener nastiness.

Hazy red color with pink head.
Aroma: raspberry
Taste: raspberry. It is too sweet.
Fles geprobeerd bij Marc. Het is een rose achtig "bier" met een rose schuimlaagje. Het lijkt op frisdrank met een scheutje wijn.
Pours red with orange taints with a small white head, aroma of grain, fruits, strawberry, flavor is slightly bitter with malt, acidity, strawberry, medium bodied

On bottle @Salling.
Pours red with small head.
Scent: Raspberry sour, a bit watery.
Taste: Really sweet. Lots of strawberries, caramel.
Texture: A bit creamy.
On tap, 25cl glass. Tastes like raspberry syrup. Sickly sweet. One is refreshing, two would be enough to make you feel sick.
Prakticky tady přidávám tento komentář, jen aby tady něco bylo, protože zpětně dopisuji 900 piv z mého seznamu a asi bych se musel u toho zbláznit.

0.25l bottle. Pink body with a light pink head. The aroma is all raspberry nothing else. The taste is similarly one-dimensional, but it also has a subtle lemony sourness to it. It's a nice drink, but very hard for me to think of it as a beer and not as raspberry syrup topped up with sparkling water.

witbier
with a little bit of added something on top
not exceptional 
much better to go with proper established belgian lambics if you are after those
Bottle 0,75 l. Color is more red than pink, hazy. Head is pink, quickly dissapears. Aroma is full of raspberry. Taste is sweet dominantly, light sour. Fruit beer, refreshing.

Red cloudy beer, good carbonation with a stable pink head. The aroma has strong raspberry notes, and some caramel and honey ones as well. In palate has a medium body with a extremely soft and sweet raspberry flavor that overcome on the malt, and a little bitterness at the end. The raspberry flavor is quite persistent in the aftertaste, which makes it enjoyable as a fruit beer but in my opinion is far too sweet.

Appearance: Pours hazy pinkish red with a light pink head, no lacing, lots of dead yeast clumps.
3/5

Aroma: Raspberry, malt and yogurt.
6/10

Taste: Raspberry, lemon, slightly sugary, malt sweetness in the finish, light acidic.
4/10

Mouthfeel: Light bodied, very low carbonated.
2/5

Overall
4/20

25 cl bottle. It is a more aromatic beer than wheat beer and too sweet for real tasting. Sweet, raspberry aroma dominate the taste, and only a light wheat and hop at the end. A beer for those who hate beers.
Red colour, small head. aroma is roosvice lemonade, ranja, red fruit. Taste is the same, sweet red fruit. meh

Kicsi, gyorsan lelappadó hab, pirosba hajló rózsaszín folyadék. Málnaszörpös illat. Édes, málnás índítás, majd fokozatosan, visszafogott búzás aromák bukkanak elő, hosszú, édeskés-szirupos utóízzel. Könnyű, közepesen szénsavas, halvány kesernye. Ittam már jobb málnás sört is.

Очень приятный розовый цвет. Аромат сладкой малины. Вкус кисло сладкий. Четко чувствуется малина и немного солода. Алкоголь полностью отсутствует, как будто его вообще нет. Больше похоже не соду чем на пиво. Но все же не самое плохой выбор из такого типа пива.

Pours milky raspberry with low white head 
Aromas fruity of raspberries, strawberry jam
Taste has sweet fruity notes of raspberry jam

250ml bottle. Pours hazy pinkish-red, pink fluffy head stays, lacing. Aroma is intensive, raspberry, citrussy, sweet. Taste is fruity, citrussy, raspberry, cherry, cherry stone. Wheaty in aftertaste. Very light body, over average carbonated. Very simple, fruity, sweet brew. Can't say there's something wrong with brew, but obviously it's not my cup of tea.

Clear pink beer with some small pink head. Aroma is raspberry, dusty with some artificial sweet notes. Taste is raspberry, light sweet and sour. Overall quite good fruit beer, but some artificial notes in taste ruins better score.

Pours pinkish amber with medium light pink head. Aroma is fruity, raspberry, some artificial notes, soap, dust, sweetness. Taste is bitter, dusty, raspberry, some grass, medicine, artificial syrup. Not my taste.
Bottle, small bubbly head, cloudy palish red color, aroma and flavor of raspbery with hints of metal, light sweetness, light bitterness lightish sourness. More a beer then expected.

(On tap) Murky ruddy brown with good pinkish head. Raspberry aroma. Medium body, slightly sticky and oily with modest carbonation. Nice balance of sweet and sour. It is quite sweet, but for a low alcohol fruit flavored beer it's not unreasonable. There's no bitterness and no hint of alcohol. Great refreshing drink but maybe marginal as a beer.

Tried the UK version in a 75CL bottle back in the day. Has a weird taste of raspberry jam with a sweetened Hoegaarden wheat beer taste. This is a weird mix that doesn't work, it could be a grower though.
Te chemische framboos smaak. Kan verfrissend zijn op een warme dag, maar veel te chemisch en kunstmatig zoet naar mijn smaak.
Flesje gedronken tijdens vakantie. Roze , licht troebel bier met mooie schuimkraag. Aroma van vruchtenlimonade. Ook de smaak is als een limonade drankje. Geen nasmaak.

Robe rosée foncée, mousse crémeuse, peu persistante. Nez plus net, sur la framboise fraîche, les bonbons à la cerise, note acidulée. Bouche à l'attaque fruitée, moins doucereuse que la précédente, mais qui reste très dosée en sucre, finale plus longue. A mes yeux plus agréable que la blanche rosée de Namur.

Tomada por segunda vez.
Con Angel77 en Brujas.

Dulce, suave, ligera, facil de beber.

Color rosado.

Lata 33 cl de supermercado Brugge 11..09.. 2017. (r508). Color rojizo rosáceo velado con espuma blanca rosacea. Sabores frescos cereales, con toques frambuesas, moras frutos rojos suaves y nada ácidos. Bastante dulce the cereal. Cuerpo ligero fácil de beber con algo de gas. Refresco dulce con toque afrutado rojo. Normal y corriente.

Sweet beer with a Clear flavour of raspberry. Too sweet for me but in general very nice aroma. Pinkish 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Sweet beer that, in my opinion, is too sweet. It should be served very cold and will not fit in everyone's taste

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Barwa różowo-malinowa, zamglona. Piana wysoka na około centymetr, drobnopęcherzykowa z nielicznymi średnimi pęcherzami, koloru białego. Po paru chwilach opada, zdobiąc lekko szkło, redukuje się do postaci cienkiego, porwanego kożuszka. Do końca utrzymuje się obrączką przy szkle. Lacing śladowy. Aromat malinowy oraz lekko słodowo-chmielowy. Smak kwaśno-słodkawy, owocowy, lekko różany, lekko słodowy. Na finiszu kwaskowatość malinowa z akcentem czerwonej porzeczki. Warka 27.02.2017
Trübes Orangerot mit relativ wenig Schaum. Malzig, süß, fruchtig, künstliches Himbeeraroma, etwas dünn.
Słodkie, malinowe, dosyć naturalne, delikatnie słodowe, ale absolutnie straszni zbalansowane bo wita tu nie czuć nawet na jotę.
Pink szín, vékony fehér hab. Málnaszörpös illat. Ízre a búza kevésbé érzodik, inkább a málna ízvilága dopminál. Hölgyek elonyben.

Larnaka 22/7 2017. 25 cl bottle from Jovanis Kiosk. Looks like an ordinary Hoegaarden except for a raspberry popping up on the label. Pours hazy amber with rosa tone with small white head. Head disappears almost immediately. Aroma is strong and Fruity. Raspberries (No great surprise), tart notes. Lemonade sweet wheat in the background. Soft carbonation and watery palate. Flavor is very sweet. Not much bitterness. Light tart berry notes. Sweet soda-like aftertaste. Might be a suitable alternative for a Bacardi Breezer but hard to take seriosly as a beer.

Bottle 
Aroma: raspberries all around 
Look: girls must love it 
Taste: sweet raspberry limo. No beer spotted. 
Overall: ladies drink

330 ml bottle. Pours an orange pink with moderate white head. Aromas of sweet red berries and wheat. Flavors follow same - earthy raspberries and strawberries. Sweet and a bit artificial but goes down well on a hot day.

Tap @ pudel. 
Poured intense red in color, thin white head. 
Perfume, lavendel and blossom aroma. 
Perfume, raspberries, sweetness, lavendel in flavor.
Can from a supermarket near Charleroi. Nose is faint raspberry, orange, citrus. Palate is mostly raspberry, not that artificial, some wheat and malt in the back. Refreshing, but not special
300ml Flasche. Trüb und rötlich mit minimaler Schaumkrone. Aroma von Wildbeeren. Fruchtig. Dezent süß. Leichter Körper. Spritzig.

Aroma: Raspberry jam, mors.
Appearance: Raspberry pink without foam
Taste: Morse, sweetness, raspberry.
Palate: Light carbonation, light body.

250 ml bottle. Pours hazy pink color with pale pink head that disappears quickly. Aroma is acid red fruits (raspberry) together with coriander seeds and wheat. Quite balanced. Taste is raspberry juicy and coriander seeds over a wheat beer backbone. Sweet-acid aste and fruity acid finish.
25cl bottle purchased @ Leclerc. Fruit beer vraiment trop sucrée. La framboise est trop présente.
bottle. light red to pink color is attractive. thin bodied, but not bad for rasberry lovers. good refresher on hot beach days.

Flasche am Flughafen in Brüssel
Hell rötlich, Hagebuttenfarbe, trüb, nur dünne Schaumschicht 
Aroma sauer, Sauerkirsch, leicht floral
Geschmack: saftartig, Rhababer (aber eher süß als sauer) - erfrischend aber nicht überragend

Aroma: raspberry syrup, fresh fruits. Taste: fruits, little bit of yeast, raspberries and some sourness. Very refreshing and easy drinking. Medium but quickly disappearing head, average lacing and high carbonation.
New 750ml bottle with cork, fruity, easy to drink, nice color, girl likes this taste, HARD for guys to get drunk with this.
Barwa różowa, w aromacie syrop malinowy. W smaku zdecydowania słodko, znowu malinowo. Całkiem ok, jak na taki wyrób.
330ml can pours out a pinkish red topped with a small head. Nose is berries some artificial flavor and lots of sweetness. Taste is more of the berries lots of sweet sugar.

@ Bangtao Beach, Thailand 20170217. Bottle (250 ml) from local minimarket. Fruity and really sweet with lots of raspberries and light vanilla notes, light to medium body with a watery to oily texture. The finish is sweet with raspberries.
Synthetic raspberry syrup, very sweet and slutty, light mineral and plastelin over-saturation. Not my type.
Frisch vom Hahn auf dem Flughafen Brüssel getrunken. Schmeckt wie Himbeerradler. Wo ist das Bier?

Buteleczka 250ml.Zakupione w Megasamie na Ursynowie za 1,99zł butelka i to ja lubię, data ważności jeszcze dwa miesiące. Barwa różowa, piana ładna drobnopęcherzykowa, ładnie opada. Aromat zdecydowanie malinowy, świeży, przyjemny. W smaku też owoce maliny, kwaskowe. dobre piwo w swoim sektorze, bardzo pijalne, może trochę za bardzo czuć sok ale dobrze ułożone.

250 ml bottle. Raspberry aroma, a bit artificial and flat taste. Slight bitterness from the Witbier. Yeasty and sweet. Refreshing and easy to drink. Sweetener rather dominant though, which is quite annoying. Nothing special.
Arôme de framboise très présent. l’ensemble est sucré sans basculer dans l’excès
Bottle. Hazy pink-red. Candy and marzipan aroma, sweet marzipan taste. Light body, too sticky, sugary finish and fizzy.
750ml bottle in Mae Kasa, Thailand. Pours a rosey red. Very sweet, fruity aroma. Taste of raspberries, candy. Watery with fair carbonation. Not my type of beer but interesting to try once.
Dzem malinowy, moze tez troche sok, sporo slodyczy, wysokie wysycenie. Smaczne.
Kolor mętnego soku malinowego. Piana intensywna. Zapach kompotu malinowego. Smak lekko sfermentowany kompot malinowy.
Backlog, ocena przepisana z untappd, w ramach uzupełniania profilu na ratebeer.

Barwa ciemno różowa, podchodzi pod rubin. Piana niezbyt gęsta, drobnopęcherzykowa, powoli opada. W aromacie bardzo wyraźnie czuć maliny, sok malinowy domowej roboty. W smaku lekko kwaśne, dominują maliny. Z tyłu niewyraźnie majaczy nuta pszeniczna. Z jednej strony niby koncernowe piwo z dużą ilością soku malinowego, z drugiej za to jest pijalne, wyraźne w smaku i nie czuć w nim wad.

A steady pour produces a one-finger thick, pale tan colored head. The beer is an amber color with a hint of red to it; when held up to the light it shows a brilliantly clear hue. The aroma smells of raspberry candies or syrup, and nothing else.



The beer is quite sweet, quite raspberry tasting, in fact I get no sense of the base beer. The body is fairly light, with only the cloying sweetness ruining the drinkability.



This is exactly what I expected, why am I even drinking this?

A 250ml bottle with a best before date of 4th May 2017, poured into a Moonzen teku glass. It poured a cloudy reddish pinkish orange colour with a two finger off white head that dissipated quickly and left some lacing. Aromas of sweet candy raspberry and strawberry with perhaps a touch of grape juice. Tastes of sweet candied raspberries followed by apple juice. The finish is somewhat watered down such that any taste becomes really weak. Light bodied with moderate to high carbonation. Overall, I’m actually fine with the artificial candy berry flavours, but that taste on the finish of being watered down is what disappoints me most.

Aromat:delikatnie malinowy, który dominuje nad resztą na którą składa się lekka przyprawowość i ślad pszenicy
Wygląd: barwa ciemnoróżowa, silne zmętnienie, piana początkowo wysoka, drobnobańkowa, podbarwiona różem, opada do cienkiej warstwy na powierzchni
Smak: słodki, malinowy, wodnisty, lekko słodowy
Podniebienie: wysokie nagazowanie, średnia pełnia, wysoka pijalność
Tap. Not very good in terms of artisanality. Overly sweet, sugary, relatively high level of artificially-feeling raspberry flavouring. Drinkable but nothing great.
Bottle. Pours reddish color, lightly pinky head. Aroma of raspberries, bit sourish. Taste is lightly sourish, medium sweet, raspberries.
It looks like wit with fruit juice. Very nice aroma of rapsberries with almond and vanila notes. Sweet fruity taste.
Butelka. Aromat malinowy bardziej, trochę może róża. W smaku wysycenie spore, słodowe.

Słabiutka piana. Piwo różowe. W aromacie malina i kwaśność, może odrobina cytryny. Może i lekko sztucznawy aromat, ale bardzo przyjemny, fajnie intensywny. Bardzo duże wysycenie. Goryczkę ciężko stwierdzić. Smaku trochę brakuje. Dominuje słodycz, trochę malin i lekka kwaśność. Trochę kompot.

Podsumowanie:
Czuć, że to wit i że malinowy. Na minus dodanie cukru i substancji słodzących.
Bouteille 33 cl - couleur framboise, mousse rose, odeur sur la framboise, goût sucré, framboise, assez chimique, pas super
C’est beau, c’est marketing, goût chimique, ça désaltère comme un panaché sucré. Vraiment pas d’intérêts. Passe ton chemin.

The aroma is dominated by raspberry mousse with sweetness of fruit gum. Reddish cloud in a glass with minimal foam. Medium sweet, little bit of raspberry sourness. Tastes like homemade compote with well-balanced carbonation. Refreshing, really good, but nothing special.
BBE 27/02/17. 0.25l pullo. Mieto nopeasti haihtuva vaahto, punertavan jaffamainen väri. Tuoksussa sulanutta vadelmamehujäätä. Suutuntuma hapokas vadelmamehujää, kuohuva, makea. Limonadia.

Average frothy white head with pink hues. good retention.
Aroma is acid red fruits (raspberry) together with coriander seeds and wheat. Quite balanced.
Taste is raspberry juicy and coriander seeds over a wheat beer backbone. Sweet-acid aste and fruity acid finish.
Watery palate, some crispy.

Barwa różowa, piana biała, intensywna.
Aromat lekko kwaśny malinowy - trochę jak oranżada w proszku. W smaku lekkie, delikatne nuty mokrego zboża i kompotu malinowego. Goryczka niska, finisz lekko kwaskowy.
Small sample, pours hazy pink/red with an off white head. Light sour and sweet fruity aroma, tastes like ’roosvicee’, berries lemonade. Not too bad really, just not very beery...

Comes in small 250ml cans, like redbull. haha Pours a huge bubbly, fizzy head and goes away right away. Has pretty weak lacing. Has a hazy pink grapefruit like appearance. Heavy carbonation. Flavours of raspberries, pink lemonade and hints of grapefruit. Gives off a fizzy tingling mouthfeel. Also pretty sweet. The small format is sufficient enough. Not too bad actually, just doesn’t really even look like a beer, looks more like a cooler type drink. overall, too much fruitiness.

0.5 l can from a supermarket in Lyon. Pours hazy pink color with pale pink head that disappears quickly. Sweet raspberry aroma. At first, sweetness appears in taste but the finish is rather sour, but quite short. Lively carbonated, light bodied. Average fruit beer.
Pour from bottle, liquid is pinkish and nearly flat, albeit lively. Smell syrupy and taste like adding berry syrup to your beer.
Redish body with a small white head. Raspberries, wheat, raspberry juice, synthetic.

W aromacie intensywnie malinowe, nieco dżemowe, słodkie z lekką pestkowością, kolendra mega w tle. W smaku słodkawe, nieco "soczkowe", ale lekka zbożowość i bazowe nuty cytrusowe dają neźle orzeźwiający napój. Kolendra w smaku nieco się gubi.

Une bière blanche bien évidemment puisque c’est une Hoegaarden.
Au niveau du goût, on sent beaucoup la framboise et pas trop la bière.
On a l’impression de boire une bière saveur grenadine, en fait au goût c’est de la grenadine

Sample from can. Red pinkish, hazy. Red berries, raspberries, strawberries, berry sweetness, wheat on nose. Ripe strawberries in flavour, light, dryish finish. Feels artificial.

-- rated with beerbasher/winphone

Aroma : chemical raspberry aroma
 Appearance :
 Taste :Raspberry medium sweet
 Palate : a bit of malty light body
 Prefered by women

can.
light red color, medium head. raspberry aroma, also wheat. sweet taste, much raspberry.

It pours hazy pink, with a thin white head. Aroma is of industrial raspberry juice and yeast. In the palate can still feel a bit of malty and yeasty Witbier in it, but it’s overwhelmed by the same industrial juice. Anyway it’s a decent radler for summer, it tastes fresh. Girly.
hazy pink liquid with frothy pink head. aroma of chemical raspberries, wheat. tastes same, medium sweetness, lightly bitter, medium sourness. light body, thin feel, average carbonation,

Bottle. Can’t believe I actually ended up trying that... Tastes like sweet artificial raspberry juice, not sure where the beer is in there, some kind of macro radler really. Pretty shameful release focusing on casual drinking young ladies maybe...
bottle @ antwep. pinky colour, light body, sweet raspberry aroma - like a refreshing soft drink. (I suggest rather for the ladies :)

Bottle of 25cl, in a Hoegaarden Tumbler glass; from the fridge.

Nice little fruity beer, with no great taste (a little chemical by the way). The colour is dark-pink...

Boarf.

Pours reddish amber, pink frothy head. Aroma is strawberry jam and raspberry. Taste is slightly sweet, refreshing, light-bodied and medium-to-low lasting. One for the summer, thirst-quenching, easy-drinking.

Bottle 33cl / Botella 33cl.
@ The Daiso Paremarushenakamura, Nagoya, Japon.
A: Hazy red / Rojo turbio.
T/S: Malt, raspberry, sweet / Malta, frambuesa, dulce.

Bottle at home in the sun. Clouded coral red with ruby hue, and clear white head. Strawberry and raspberry lemonade syrup, sugar replacement/sweetener. Over medium sweet with a mild stale cardboard and sandy finish. Under medium body, average carbonation. I’d prefer a raspberry lemonade or a pilsner over this any time, but it’s still quite a refreshing drink.

25cl bottle from Rimi Hypermarket in Jelgava. Pours hazy red with a somewhat modest, pink head. Fruity aroma with notes of raspberry candy, hints of citrus and wheat. Medium sweet with some acidity - flavour reminds more of artificial raspberry candy than the real thing. Somewhat refreshing and fairly drinkable, but not my kind of thing.

citrus, berries, hazy, amber, medium sweetness, lightly sour, light body, lively, astringent. Almost alarmingly sweet nose, strong mixed berry. Thankfully not as sweet as it smells, balanced with a nice tartness at the end. Refreshing in the mouth, disappears quickly. Overall it tastes too artificial, quite like a diet soda.

Hoegaarden er kendt som en god wit, forståeligt nok, bruger den selv ofte om sommeren. Hoegaarden Rosée er også en meget frisk øl i smagen, den har smag af lidt belgisk frugtøl, men slet ikke samme surhed. Så hvis man er til øl der smager af frugt, men ikke de noget syrlige smag af lambic, er Hoegaarden Rosée et godt alternativ.

F: off-white, average, quick gone.
C: hazy, amber, opaque.
A: fruity, raspberries, red apples, yeast.
T: nice tartness, malt, light wheat, strawberries, candy sugar, light body, lively carbonation, sweet finish, as radler not bad.
Bottle 25cl. Small white layer leaving. Hazy peach rose color. Quite flat. Aroma is frozen strawberry daquiri, candy, light wheat, passive plums. Sweet taste of strawberries.

Bottle at the Hoegaarden cafe, 23/07/2015. Hazed pink grapefruit orange coloured pour with a thin pink head. Aroma is grape, raspberry, red berry, bit fake wheaty grains. Flavour is composed of pink sweet fruit, artificial, thin wheaty grains, artificial raspberry, light rubber. Palate is thin watery, highish carbonation, wheaty.
On tap at Pint Factory. I was surprised how much I liked this, very refreshing and easy to drink, not overly sweet.

Can. Pours pink with pale pinkish thick head. Aroma is malty, raspberry, flour. Taste is medium sweet, artificial raspberry, other red berries, malty, wheaty, a bit sourness also. Thin body. Soft carbonisation. Drinkable.

pours a murky pinkish amber with a frothy white head and some lacing. aroma of raspberry jam, flavour of fruits, yeast, grass. not cloyingly sweet like some other raspberry-flavoured beers, but the artificial sweetener aftertaste is present.

250 ml bottle bought at 7-Eleven on Lock Road, Tsim Sha Tsui.



Cloudy, hazy dull rose red colour with a layer of dirt like yeast sediements; One quarter finger head with soapy off white foam which fades in 20 seconds; Good sticky lacing and zero carbonation; Fragrant aroma of light malt, with strong wheat, strong tartness, vegetable juice, light raspberry, coriander, light citrus peels, sugar and strong yeast; Mid to light sweet taste of light malt, with strong wheat, light tartness, light raspberry, assorted berry juice, very light sugar, yeast and thin lemon;
Close to light body, slightly slick and juicy palate; Mouth feel is fair maltyness with fairly strong wheat in a slightly thick background. Low tartness, berry juice taste all around but pretty low-fi, so does the sweetness. Yeasty and light lemon to round. Quite alright… 
Hoppiness is citrus peels in nose, and very light lemon in taste. No bitterness, just light berry wheaty finish; Slightly dry after taste. Very easy and wheaty to mouth.



Comments: I was expecting something very sweet and fake, but it turns out quite the opposite: the basic Hoegaarden Wit base holds up well, and the infused raspberry and fruit juice are understated with very low sweetness. Not as Summer-like as it seems, but it’s agreeable and drinkable.

Piana biała średnio pęcherzykowa, szybko się redukuje i lekko zdobi szkło. Barwa przypomina mi sok z grejpfruta. Jest mocno zmętnione. Aromat bez niespodzianek. Maliny, lekka róża i gdzieś w tle aromat jasnych słodów. Całość aromatu jest lekko słodka. Na szczęście nie męcząco słodka. W smaku o dziwo nie ma malin na początku. Jest słodowe, lekkie delikatnie czuć cytrusy a dopiero po chwili maliny. Posmak bardzo przypomina mi domowe soki z malin. Świetny balans. Piwo nie męczy słodkością ale też nie jest to sok rozrobiony piwem. Wysycenie bardzo lekkie, oczywiście brak goryczki. Dosyć wodniste i stosunkowo pijalne. Co prawda nie są to moje klimaty ale piwo nie jest złe.

0,5l Dose. Rosa-orange Farbe mit pinkem cremigem Schaum. Frischer Himbeerduft mit Zitronennote. Antrunk fruchtig. Die Himbeere dominiert. Vom Witbier ist leider nicht allzuviel zu schmecken. Erinnert an ein Fromboise.
Lata, en casa. Color rosa, aromas fruta dulzor excesivo. sabor dulce, cuerpo ligero.

Bottle bought on clearance from Tesco (this should have been the required warning!). Bottle corked champagne style, opens with a good pop. Pours very fizzy and lively. Colour dusky pink, lively head. Aroma of candy floss and raspberry. Tastes just slightly of the base wheat, with overpowering cloying sweetness of berries and meringue.

Artificial raspberry aroma, grayish and reddish pink colour, long lasting small sized creamy off-white head, light body, average carbonation, sweet sugary and sour raspberry taste, raspberry and ester palate. Smooth.

25cl from tap@Spa Francorchamps in plastic cup@approx 7 degrees C. Pours slightly hazy pink with white head with sufficient retention. Sweet aroma of somewhat artificial raspberry. Taste quite sweet with a hint of yeast and witbeer shining through the too dominant raspberry sour-sweetness. Short aftertaste the same. Watery texture and mouthfeel. More like raspberry pop than beer. Refreshing but uninteresting.
I love the taste of this beer, the color is pale red, lovely rose smell and raspberry taste, feels like heaven
From the can. Pours hazy pink with white head. Sweet and red fruits. A bit wheat mouth feel and slightly bready finish. Reasonable but too "fruit refreshment"

Simple light raspberry, bit artificial, yeasty, kinda wheaty, bit too watery and quite unbalanced. Moderate to intense sweetness with light sourness. Not disaster, but quite sad. COuld be used as thirst quencher only
Keg at la trappiste. Pours hazy pink, nose is light raspberry, sugary, taste is sugary sweet, fruity.

Bottle sample at a tasting . Thanks Shmupi. 3 years after BBD. Clear red-amber color with a big stable head. Smell and taste – heavy sweet, fruity, yeasty, cough syrup, artificial sugary. Light-bodied, sticky and not very pleasant.

Bottle sample at a tasting at Tom L’s place. Thanks Shmupi. Clear orange with small white head. Very sweet aroma, syrupy and sugary with notes of peach and lemon. Extremely sweet flavor, syrupy and sugary with notes of strawberry. Lively carbonation, medium-bodied. Too sweet and artificial.

Bottle sample at a tasting at Tom L’s place. Thanks Shmupi. 3 years after BBD. Cloudy orange-red with a pinkish white head. Aroma of artificial candy-ish raspberry. Very sweet flavor with saccharine, artificial raspbery candy, and a cardboard note. Light-bodied and a bit sticky. Doesn’t feel very oxidized, but way too sweet.
Bottle in Brussels. Hazy red body with creamy head. Nose is fruits, raspberries, sugar. Full bodied. Taste of fruits, raspberres and malts. Quite sweet. Lots of sugar in the sweet finish.
Pink cloudy with small white head. Raspberry taste with some touch of coriander in background

Bottle. Pale red. Very small head but a decent carbonation. Rasberry flavour and aroma. Refreshing

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Raspberry aroma a bit hay like also. Cloudy pink/orange. No head. Medium sweetness, slighty sour. Quite lively.
It is a beer with a industrial taste of red fruits. It is ok when the weather is hot. A nice side is that it is sparkling.

WYGLĄD: Barwa różowa, mętne. Piana drobna, niska.

AROMAT: Mało intensywny. Owszem malina wyczuwalna, ale słodka i muląca. W tle zboża.

SMAK: Słodowy z nieznaczną słodyczą owocową, czy malinową to kwestia interpretacji. Goryczka niska, krótka.

0,3 l bottle, bought at Brolters, Bremen. Unclear bright orange in the glass, small head. As expected raspberries on the nose.Taste is fresh fruity, little bit wheat and citrus in the second row. Flat finish but still a refreshing one.

Can. Cloudy pale red body with a medium head. I don’t know how they do it but the aroma feels really natural - it’s almost like freshly crushed raspberries in a cup. I don’t care if it’s partly chemical. The taste is fruity too but the sadly the sweetness goes over the top here. If only it came without the artificial sweeteners it would be great.

Bottle. Raspberry nose, with some light wheaty notes. Medium dark pink, frothy head that diminishes quickly. Sweet red berries, with a jump of soapy flavors in mid palate, sugar, and a thin sweet finish. Thin-medium body, and a touch astringent. Okay. Not really so interesting.

Bottle. Pours hazy redly orange, with a quickly receding creamy head. Aroma is loads of sweet raspberries, some white sugar and not really much else. 
Full body, with average carbonation. Flavour is sweet raspberries and lots of fruity notes, as well as some sweetly roasted malts. A really fruity and drinkable thirst quencher. But too sweet,and lacking a bit, or really a lot, more complexity.

Fine persistent foam and a pleasant fruit aroma of strawberries and a little grapefruit. The taste is light and elegant both raspberry, grape and strawberry. Any real comparison with traditional beer can not be found, but we probably all know a woman or two who claims they do not like beer, but instead rejoice over a glass of wine. For these women are Hoegaarden Rosée the gift that can give them a new experience. Carbonation is mild and can be enjoyed chilled without significant taste deterioration. A nice refreshing fruit beer for a hot summer.

Lager like white soft foam head. The beer is very cloudy and has a light red color with a hint of orange.It has a lemonade like appearance. It looks like what you expect from a witbier with red fruit. The smell is sweet and sour and very fruity. I smell grapefruit and red forrest fruit. The tast has the same fruitiness. For a fruit beer, this is very nice. Very nice for a fruit beer. I don’t really like fruit beer, but this is quite nice. Very fruity taste. Very sweet. However, again, it isn’t really beer to be honest.

The aroma is full of raspberries, a LOT of them and a tiny bit of chocolate, oddly enough. The color is very red, just some like raspberry juice. The taste is full of raspberries and nothing else. The finish is long and sweet. There is no head. Not much beer over this one but the taste is good if you’re into sweet beer. Not bad!
Red With White thin foam. Raspberry taste and smell but finely Balanced. A bit thin.
Color rosado y bastante espumosa. Aroma neutro. Muy bebible y refrescante con un tono muy frutal, en un trago efervescente. Mejor que una lambic, aunque no deja de parecer un sorbete o refresco.
Geweldig lekker biertje. Zeer verfrissend. Mooie grapefruit smaak en aroma. Een van de betere radler bieren.

Light pink in colour. Both aroma and taste are very sweet, with raspberry as a predominant note. This should be treated more as a juice, rather than a beer to enjoy.
Tasted in Liege.
Matt rød noe tåkete med fingerhøyt hvitt skum. lukter jordbær og bringebær. Smaker litt kunstig bærsmak. noe syrlig. Kort

12/IV/15 - 33cl can from the supermarket @ home - BB: n/a (2015-432)  


Little cloudy pale pinkish orange beer, very big off-white head, little stable, bit adhesive. Aroma: very sweet, sugary, raspberry jam, little metallic. MF: ok carbon, medium body. Taste: very sweet, just raspberry jam, that’s all, nothing else.

piana biala,zostajaca do konca spozycia,zapach piekny i naprawde malinowy bez zadnych chemicznych nalecialosci,smak juz nie dorownuje zapachowi,w smaku jakby wodniste,moze lekko malinowe ale tez zbyt kwaskowate,piwo orzezwiajace,dobre na upaly,nie do degustowania

Overall: Sweet, sodalike.
Note: On-tap at Brasserie du Commerce. Reviewed 2015-04-22.
Helder roserood bier met veel schuim. Smaak is fruitig, sporen van frmboos en heel licht zoet. Ietwat bittere afdronk. Best aardig bier als dorstlesser.
From tap. Enjoyable forest fruit aromas. Pink grapefruit color with medium top. Raspberry taste is very real. Like natural raspberry juice. Very nice summer drink.

Lukt: Jordbær og friske roser.

Utseende: Dunkel rødgul farge.

Skum/kullsyre: Tynt lag skum.

Smak: Søt smak av jordbær.

Hvor: Kjøpt@Det Gode Brygg, Sandnes, Nydt@Lokal hjemme tasting hos Bryne

Medium: Flaske@250ml, ABV@3%, Når@20.03.2015

J’ai pris ce liquide rosé par défaut d’autre chose, en accompagnement d’un repas avec des amis
dans un restaurant chinois. 10 % de fruits, dit l’étiquette, dont 6 % de framboises.
J’ai pris un dessert aux fruits pour le croire … Mes points vont bien entendu au repas chinois !!

Smells like cheap strawberry jam, is a very mild pink colour with a bit of white froth on top, tastes just like cheap strawberry jam!!! to be fair its ok, bit if a girly summertime drink though. how sexist of me, sorry.

Can, 50cL. Home. A pink grapefruit opaque beer with a medium white head ; average retention and lacing. Aroma of raspberry, sugar. Medium to heavy sweet, light refreshing, acid note. Light body, watery texture, average texture, sweet finish. Overall, disappointed. It’s more like a fruity soda.

Non so come si faccia a parlare di birra in questo caso... E’ uno scirppo di frutta non fosse per quel poco di schiuma sopra al liquido rossastro. Aroma esclusivamente di lampone, carbonazione elevata e null’altro.

250ml bottle served in a tumbler glass.
Pours a cloudy pinkish color forming a medium and not persistent head. Few lacings left. Nose is very fruity. Tart with some notes of wheat. Taste is very fruity too. Strong notes of raspberry and wheat. Slightly acid but, in overall, smooth and slightly sweet. Light body and strong carbonation. Not as good as the standard Hoegaarden.
opalescent pinkisk colour, medium sized pink head; aroma and tste is dominated by raspberry wit some witbier notes; far from being my favourite...
Blanche aromatisée framboise, un combo sucré fruité pas du tout à mon goût. Bouteille bue le 29/04/2013.
250ml bottle. Hazy red orange color. Small size, white head, disappears. Sweet, raspberries, sour notes in aroma. Raspberry, sweet, juicy taste. Way too sweet. Medium carbonation.

Lichtroos troebel bier met lichtroze schuimkraag.
Zwakke frambozengeur in de neus met licht metalentoets.
Framboos in de mond, licht moutig en prikkelend.
Afdronk is zoetig en droog.

Bière sucrée au bon goût fruité. 
elle convient bien pour les palais peu habitués au bière plus houblonées.
Tastes like half hoegaarden witbeer and half raspberry sirup. Not as Bad as expected, but not worth the price.
Nice pinkish-amber appearance with big head. Super-artificial sweet smell. Metallic smell as well. Taste is artificially sweet Not really raspberries in that taste. No. Just no.

Aroma: Medium raspberry. light metallic
Appearance: Body: Cloudy, pinkish/red. Large light-pink, rocky head. Good retention.
Flavour: Medium raspberry. Medium-light malty. Medium dry finish, lingering raspberry.
Mouthfeel: Medium body, medium carbonation.
Overall: Easy drinking, refreshing. Would have liked the beer part to feature more.

250 ml bottle, poured. Thanks Andre!
20. Fruit Beer
16A. Witbier

Pours an off red body with a small thick head. Not very pleasent aroma of berries. Nice raspberry taste.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Ciekawe piwo smakowe, ale chyba raczej dla Pań. Przyjemny malinowy posmak przyćmił trochę dobrego przeniczniaka jakim jest Hoegaarden. Mimo wszystko całość smakuje przyjemnie.
wow - would have though this would be as good or better than the original white. nope! came of as aniseptic raspberry atop fake muddled belgian yeast/fruit/crap. Meh...
Keg brew house Sheffield. Pink thin head. Aroma is sweet pink grapefruit strawberry. Taste is same not much tart just sweet. Ok stuff.

Pint from brew house, sheffield. deep pink/hazy red with floating particles and a little sticky white head. Aroma is sweet strawberries and with rounded wheaty flavour adding depth. Taste is mostly sweet with slight tartness, bit sickly. Mild carbonation and medium body.
Sample 0.15l at Dranken Geers Ghent Belgium.Pour it pink color with big white head.Aroma and taste of wheat and sweet of raspberry.Nice refreshment summer taste
Pours a hazy pink color. Aroma and taste are sweet with raspberries. Light carbonation.
bottle at francis in pilsen, thanks petruska. bright pink with a gentle white head; raspberry syrup aroma, slightly woody; extra sweet raspberry extract flavours; okay for a sip or 2

@Brussel, Even snel wat weten te ticken uit het flesje/glas van de vrouw. oogt als een mooi rose/rode nagenoeg kraagloos ’biertje’. het aroma is erg fruitig, smaken van framboos, zoet, licht zuurtje, afdronk lekker fris en fruitig, niet slecht.

0,25L bottle, BB 18.05.2015. Pours red-pink with whiteish head. The head doesn’t stay. Aroma is sweet, sour, raspberries, strawberries, somewhat artificial. Flavor is sweet and sour, soapy, some raspberry jam, and wheat. Body is watery. Overall: doesn’t feel like a beer, but raspberry lemonade. I could easily drink this in a hot summer day.
Free pack so figured I’d try. As a beer, expectedly oversweet and not my style. As a soda, actually kind of nice. But wouldn’t buy it.

Another sweet fruitbeer based on witbier, since 2007, with 10% raspberry juice. Dirty pinkish, mousse-like head, deep pinkish red colour, misty. Aroma strong raspberry-like, wheat, orange peel, faint spices (coriander?). Taste equally dominated by raspberry, fortunately not too sugary, sourish accent, some wheat and orange peel, less cloying and sticky than I feared. Still nothing suitable for my personal taste.
Bottle sample @home. Pours cloudy pink with off-white head. Aroma some wheat and artificial raspberry. Taste wheaty, raspberry, bit sweet. Refreshing, but nothing really special.
Bottle at home. Pours grapefruit pink with a pinkish white head. Aroma of sweet, bit sour, red fruits, raspberry. Taste is sweet, raspberries, red fruits, bit of malts and wheat coming through.

Have had nicer fruit beers to be honest. Smells and tastes of raspberry, obviously, but the sweetness is a bit overwhelming and there is little trace of 
hoegaarden in there.
Een heel lekker verfrissend bier voor op warme dagen te drinken. Een goede dorstlesser met wat smaak.

750ml bottle from Tesco - Bright pink body, foamy white head, looks rather artificial to be honest. Nose is a sweet, floral raspberry, a bit of yeast at the back. Taste is light and sweet, almost sickly raspberry jam, with the fizziness letting it down and making it a bit mouth clacking. Okay for what it is, but 750ml in one serving? Hard going.
Bottle@bette ølhus. Pink Red haze. Huge foam. Intens raspberry fruity notes. Dusty sweet. Perfume-like beer.

Pours between red and pink color, topped with a very small and quickly disappearing pink(ish) head.
Sweet fruity aroma is very easy to pick up, although too artificial.
The taste is sweet and fruity. Basically a "girly" beer.

Bona cervesa, és bastant equilibrada i gustosa.
Buena cerveza, es bastante equilibrada y sabrosa.
Beurk!!! N’ aime vraiment pas, trop sucré avec un gout edulcoré industriel...
Dans la tendance des bières aromatisées, chaque fabricant y va de sa bière au fruits rouges, avec +/- de réussite. La framboise est présente et fait oublier que c’est une bière blanche à la base.
caramel, floral, bubblegum, red, cloudy, heavy cloying sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour, light body, slick feel, lively,
Large bottle from Asda. Cloudy orange red colour. The aroma is raspberry, and not much else, the taste us fruit, syrup, almost alcopop. Not very beery.

Appearance: Pinkish color with a pink head. Some lacing.
Aroma: A bit artificial raspberry.
Palate: Medium body. Some acidic notes and a mild bitterness. A bit to sweet and average carbonation.
Taste: Sweet raspberry.
Overall impression: Could have been ok if it was a bit less sweet.
Personal stats: Bottle from Boni in Odijk, Netherlands

Opaque light pink with small greyish head. Massive smell of raspberry. Aroma of raspberry, artificial sweetener, some yeast, light orange, dough, spices and berries. Light bodied. Even for a commercial artificial fruit beer this is bottom of the barrel. Still drinkable though and on par with most lemonades.
Couleur legerment rosé, bonne mousse rose. Bon nez de framboise, un peu citrique. Gout doux et fort de framboises, fin très sucrée un peu acide.

25cl bottle. Ordered this once by accident on a terrace in Arlon, quite a while ago, but the sticky asparatame syrup still sticks on my mind’s palate. Candified congealed raspberry thawage. A further step down in INBev-diluted Hoegaarden’s portfolio and a sweet, sticky insult to the idea(l) of sensualism in brewing.

Bottle, pours a weird orange-pink color with a white/pink head, the raspberry aroma is noticeable, the taste is very sweet, almost syrupy, it is light but the artificial sweetness of it almost ruins the beer.
Her dress is pink-orange colored. The result is low tasty and refreshing fruity mix.

Couleur fraise, trouble à en être totalement opaque, elle émet des notes de framboises en nez, et rappelle par le fait même un cooler de basse qualité ; sucres et fruits occupent le pavé. En bouche, c’est poudreux, maladroitement acidulé, assez puissant en saveurs il faut l’avouer, mais la boisson est lassante, et il en résulte une fatigue du buveur qui tend à vouloir clore rapidement la dégustation. Une curiosité rose pas très réussie.
Para ser una cerveza "con sabor" guarda un poco de recuerdo de cerveza. Para tomar cuando no quieras una cerveza.
Trübes orange-pinkes Getränk mit geringer Schaumkrone. Geruch süß nach Himbeeren, Geschmack ebenfalls süß nach Himbeeren, Bier kann man nich heraus schmecken.
Color entre rosa y naranja, olor algo acido. Sabor muy dulce, adulcorado y artificial.
Une erreur de la nature. La classique est 100 fois meilleure, c’est dire...
had a tasting glass when my mother was drinking this. pink read colour, strawberry, cherries, fresh fruits, bit sour-ish (not to sweet), citrus, some grains, ok
Une bière bien rafraichissante même pour ceux qui ne sont pas très bière, elle est aussi bon marché.
Hazy peach coloured beer with white foam head. Aroma of candy. Taste of sweet fruit preserves

Bottle. Hazy orange pink tinted body, white head. Aroma of artificial candy, sugar, wheat. Taste of tropical fruits and cherries, again artificial, with a short berry finish and a thick oversweetened body.
Way too sweet fruit beer. I they had used real fruit, it could have been something.
Bière très fruitée et sucrée. Assez chimique. Sans intérêt. A éviter.......

Bottle, at Antwaerps Bierhuyske. Drank a little from a buddy his glass.
APPEARANCE: light clouded pink beer, nice stable pinkish head.
NOSE: little sourness noticeable? But some, mostly artificial, sweetness noticeable.
TASTE: no more sourness unfortunately, very sweet, and maybe even a little chemical.
Though, in general a fresh beer.
Light pink and cloudy white beer, extremely fruity afterflavour that lingers on for too long.
Red color and funny light pink foam. Very fruity smell of raspberry and some yeast. Aroma is very fruity. Very sweet. Not much of a wit taste. Sweetness stays very long.
0,25l Flasche. Rosefarben mit heller Schaumkrone. Leider kommt vom Witbier nicht viel durch wegen der Fruchtaromen.
Extremely refreshing and fruity with the characteristic tartness witbier base.

Geruch nach Himbeeren. Der Antrunk ist furchtbar süßlich-künstlich. Schmeckt genau wie die rote Kinderzahnpasta mit dem grünen Dino, die ich früher immer hatte. Total künstlich. Der Hauptteil ist auch nicht besser. Zum Nachgeschmack wird das Bier leicht säuerlich, der künstliche Fruchtton bleibt aber. 

--> untrinkbar. richtig widerlich-künstlich!



Test vom 14.10.2008, Gebinde: Glasflasche	Noten: 12,0,9,3,12,2 - 4,40

Canette de 250 ml achetée chez Épicerie Lauzière (Drummondville, QC). Arôme: Odeur de framboise. Apparence: La couleur est rosâtre avec une moyenne densité de bulle. Présence d’un mince col mousseux et d’une fine dentelle sur le verre. Saveur: Goût de framboise sucrée avec une pointe de miel. Durée moyenne de l’arrière goût. Palette: Le corps est moyen avec une texture onctueuse. Moyenne effervescence en bouche. Présence de framboise en arrière goût. (Rating #5329)
Bottle conditioned. Thin white head. Crimson body. Strawberries, raspberries, rose wine. Sweet with some tanginess. Dry finish.
Pours hazy pink with a pale pink head. Very fruity aroma. Taste is sweet and fruity with just a hint of grain.
В этом пиве всё решает пшеница, ну и бренд. Не считая этого — лимонад какой-то.
Nope. Pours slightly cloudy link with an initial fomy head that fades quickly. Notes of strawberry candy and tomatoes. Taste is medium sweet. Light body with medium soft carbonation. Yuck

Det här var lite kul, aromen antydde en viss syrlighet som inte alls visade sig i smaken, min gissning är att man har dolt den i socker. Smaken har fina och behagliga inslag av körsbär men sötman blir alldeles för mycket, tyvärr.

A bit different to the norm, definitely a summer drink. its a good job its 3% as it is very easy to drink and goes down very easily.
Looks wise its a cloudy pink, light head that dissipates quickly.
Lots of fruity aroma consisting of predominantly raspberry then a hint of strawberry.
Very sweet, slightly citrus taste but a bit lacking in real body or lasting flavor.
Quite lively and fizzy but clears the palate well.
Although i expected more i wasn’t disappointed by it and would drink it again.

Clear dark orange/rose colored, small but lasting head. Fruity nose, strawberries, raspberries, lemonade, lactic notes, hint of kriek. Sweet fruity flavor, somewhat artificial, lemonade. Lasting sticky sweet finish. Pretty awful in flavor, but the aroma isn’t even that bad.
Orange/pink colour, soft carbonation. Very sweet and chemically taste. Malty and berry juice.
On tap. Cloudy orange and pink with an off-white head. Aromas are sweet wheat and artificial raspberry. Flavours are sweet and artificial raspberry. Very easy drinking.

250 ml can from St. Nicholas Metro. Pours a pink-tinged orange with moderate, lasting white head, with a faint pink tinge itself. Aroma is sweet raspberry/strawberry candy. Flavour is also candyish strawberry and raspberry with some faint apple. Much too sweet to be refreshing. Light body, but not terrible given the ABV. Not a total disaster, but not good.
Sweet, slightly cloying but not offensively so. Definite raspberry flavor, with Hoegaarden’s typical excellence in mouthfeel and crispness. Finish is long and sweet.

Realy pink, cloudy beer with a pink foamy head. It has a sweet aroma of blackberry’s, raspberry’s and some other forest fruits. It has a sugar sweet taste, but in my opinion a bit forced into it. It has a sweet aftertaste, but then again, in my opinion a bit to much.

Roze gekleurd, troebel bier met een roze gekleurde schuimkraag. Het heeft een zoet aroma van zwarte bessen, frambozen en andere bosvruchten. Het smaak zoet als suiker, en in mijn mening te geforceerd. Het heeft een zoete nasmaak, maar in mijn mening licht de nadruk er weer te veel op.

25.07.2013. 0,25l Can. Brussel. Golden reddish orange colour with pinkish white head. Aroma of Raspberry. Flavour is sweet raspberry. Very dominant fruity charskter with little flavours of mslt and bitterness. Refreshing but also sweet and flat. Not espesially well balanced.

Petite canette de 250 ml. 3% d’alcool. Versée dans mon verre Hoegaarden, elle est opaque, voilée, très effervescente. Couleur rosée, mousse quelque peu fugace. Nez de framboises sucrées, avec un peu de levure en arrière-plan. En bouche, c’est très frais, très fruité. Cela goûte le jus de framboises pétillant. Le goût de la Hoegaarden est fort subtil, et je dirais qu’il est pratiquement complètement anéanti par le jus de framboises. C’est rafraîchissant, pas méchant en soi. Petite bière d’été qui plaira sans aucun doute à la gente féminine.

250 ml can. Pours a veiled orangeish pink with a resilient white-pinkish head. Aroma is raspberry. Flavor is sugar and fake raspberry candy. Finish is sugar and artificial red berry flavor. Light body, average carbonation. Refreshing, but oh so fake...

Bouteille de 25cl. Couleur rose pale, mousse moyenne de tenue moyenne. Encouragé par les bons échos que j’ai recu, je me lance dans cette dégustation qui sent le gros coup marketing adressé aux buveurs occasionnels et surtout à la gent féminine. Pas de surprise, ça a bien le goût de framboise avec quelques arômes de rose en plus mais plus grand chose à voir avec une bière. Une boisson consensuelle, très facile à boire mais sans aucune personnalité. Trouvée à Intermarché - Montigny en Gohelle.

Colour is hazy deep pink with medium head that disappears fast. Aroma is fruity.

Taste followes aroma, quite artificial though. Lightly carbonated, as much as an carbonated Ice-Tea, or lemonade

Nothing special but if it’s too early in the morning or another occasion where you shouldn’t drink beer, that can save you the troubles
30cl bottle at home. Hazy pink with a pinkish white head. Very fruity with medium carbonation. This is more cassis lemonade then beer. It can be nice on a hot sunny day :)

Bought a bottle at the supermarket. Has a pink to orange color and a a small white head, not much bubbles. Aroma of coriander, raspberries and a little strawberry. Taste is medium sweet and fresh which changes in a light bitter and has a raspberry taste. Aftertaste is fruity and fresh which is very short. Just an average beer (or what you want to call it). Not my style but very fresh for a hot summer day. If I have to choose, give me the regular Hoegaarden.

250ml redbull size can from Coop. Pours a light Oinkish with a near-bubbly white foam. Aroma is consistent with a belgian wit, yeast-forward with a hint of raspberry. Taste is quite sweet, with raspberries overloading the palate. Finishes sticky sweet and tart. Might serve well as an after dinner beer, but not the best fruit beer out there

250 ml. can (3.0% abv). Pours a reddish orange colour with a one finger head. Aroma is raspberries as is the taste. Sweet malty artificial flavoring with heavy carbonation. Would be refreshing on a hot day, but not something I would even consider calling a real beer.
Bottle. Hazy orange red color with a minimal head. Aroma of cherry and raspberry. Very sweet taste.
Horribly artificially sweetened beer if one can even call it a beer. Leaves artificial after taste! ---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

750ml champagne style bottle. Not really a beer at a weak 3%ABV the beer is totally overpowered by raspberries and some other mixed fruits. More like a summer fruit soda. Too sweet to be described as refreshing.
Draft at a bar in The Hague.  Pours reddish orange with a white head.  Aroma of artificial raspberry and sugar.  Flavour is fairly heavy sweet.  Light bodied with light carbonation.

25 cl. bottle sampled @ home. Procured from a Delhaize. BBF 22/03/2014. Pours like a raspberry / blood orange Fanta, light pink head, quickly disappearing, carbonation is crazy. Bubbling like a soda. Nose is lightly metallic, faint grapefruit & raspberry grenadine, heavily chemical nose, huge amount of sweeteners,… Taste is pure artificial sweeteners, purely chemical, taste is pure artificial flavours, grapefruit & raspberry additives, nothing but chemical sweeteners,… articial & chemical bitterness & slight acidity in the finish. Soda body, big carb. This is soda because any possible beer base is completely covered – no wonder the NA version is not rateable on RB – this doesn’t really quality. I think that the Citrus version was worse looking back at my rating & from memory. I would much, much, much rather have a Fanta or something like that instead of this. Seriously you cannot believe how much artificial sweeteners & flavours are in here – never had anything like this – unbelievable.
Bottle 0.25l at home. Originally rated 27062012. Colour is reddish with small white head. Aromas and flavours: Berries, raspberries and dryness. Horrible.

Cannette de 250ml. Bière rosée pétillante avec une mousse peu durable blanche-rose. Un nez chimique de framboise. La bouche pique tant elle est pétillante, facile, rafraichissante. Une bière légère aux framboises artificielles mais qui se laisse boire comme un bon Kool-Aid.

Fizzy, cloudy rosé coloured beer. A delicate, slightly spicy aroma of fruit, obviously raspberry, plus there is a sweet, soapy rose petal aroma. Fizzy and dry mouthfeel. Dry raspberry fruit flavour, with an underlying wheat beer spiciness, this then adds a hint if sweet tropical fruit, that in turn accentuates the floral, rose petal element from the aroma. The finish is dry and fizzy.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Quite refreshing and nice aroma in there. VEry pink but not annoying in taste. Aromatic and wheaty.
aroma of rassbery,    a brownish color, with a fast dissapering head.  s weet and sour taste.,  a long aftertaste of rassberrys,
On tap at Bierfest-Hannover. Sensual my arse. It’s pink and sweet. There are way better framboises than this.

250 ml can from local Iga A: fake raspberry, with distant cereal. App: hazy salmon small white head. T/p: full body with unnecessarily sweet finish. O: I see why they package it that way. Tartness don’t kill. Unbalanced close to nasty.

Mostly clear berry red, big pink tinged foamy white head settles and fades. Pungent raspberry aroma. Sweet fruity berry taste, apple juice, a faint presence of malt... I think. Softly carbed, light bodied, no hopped. Starts to get cloying halfway through, the portion controlled 250 ml can is more than sufficient.  LF (Lagerboy Friendly)

Garrafa 750 ml. Cerveja com aroma pronunciado de cereja. Cor de um avermelhado fraco. Sabor de frutas persistente no pálato. Adocicado bastante pronunciado. Harmoniza perfeitamente com sobremesas como um cheese cake.

Can. Pours cloudy pink orange with stable pinkish head. Clear aroma of raspberries. Refreshing, not excessively sweet taste of berries and grain. A little dryish aftertaste. An OK beverage, if not quite recognisable as beer.
next time I’ll leave this beer in the shelves of the shop, false aroma, false palate, false beer made with false aromas and not with true fruits. warning!
I’m not the biggest fan of these kind of drinks but I figured once wouldn’t kill me. It tastes like raspberries.. not much else I can say about this drink.

Can (250 ml). Pink/salmon with a huge quickly diminishing white head and some lacing. Aroma is of raspberry jam, slight acidity and some sweetness. Taste is sweet with raspberry jam and a touch of acidity. Thin to medium body. Extremely drinkable... as flavored water. Raspberries are artificial.

Can 250ml.
Pours pink/salmon with low white/piny head. Some lacing. Aroma is of strawberries, sugar, wheat, fruits. Taste is of strawberries, sugar, wheat. Palate: Ligth body. Overall: Pretty sweet, very fruity (combiing in something somewhat artificial, but not oo much). Dangereously drinkable, but at 3% abv, I should be safe. Not a serious beer, but I don’t hate that kind of easily drinkable alternative to session beers. Wouln’t drink taht on a regular basis, as I suspect it can get boring pretty fast.
Nice fruit beer, you can taste the traditional hoegarden flavour subtley under the fruit flavours.

March 2013 - cold bottle (room temp is silly cold at the moment).  Tastes like raspberry of course.  Fizzy pop, squash. Very easy drinking. Very sweet.  Absolutely no beer qualities.  Very poor for a beer, but nothing wrong with it as a sweet alcoholic beverage.
Reddish colour with pinkish head. Aroma of raspberrys and soda,sweet and unbalanced with flavor of candy and hops,light body and short finish.

Draft at the Brussels Beer Cafe, Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. Poured a hazy reddish orange with a thin frothy white head. The aroma is yeasty with a little citrus. The flavour is sweet, but not too sickly. There are some raspberries there which head right for the palate. It’s a little bit like drinking and adult raspberry soda, but without the bubbles. I can’t say I didn’t enjoy it. It’s fine to drink every now and again, but my dentist would kill me if I was able to drink it all night long.... which I’m not!

Bottle @ Home. Pours hazy dark rusty brown with a light pink / white head. Aroma of little wheat, sweet raspberry, sugar. Flovor is very sweet with sweet raspberry and some sugar. Medium body, lively carbonation, sweet finish. Sweet, but surprisingly drinkable, not bad. 020313
I am not very fond of fruit or sweet beers, but this one is well balanced and shows a very personality. I liked it!
Bottle: Mainly frainy with few fruit notes. Light pink color, pinkish-white head. Dominant grainy and corny flavor, light to medium sweet, few fruit character. Poor.

250ml can. Pink pour, hazy, big foamy pinkish cap. Sweet raspberry nose. Taste s sweet, syrupy raspberry fruit. Sugary finish. Medium body, moderate carbonation. Too sweet and fake tasting to enjoy more than one tiny can of this, but I know I’m not the target audience for this beverage.

Dainty 250 mil can from Broue Ha Ha, served cold in a tulip glass. Cloudy salmon pink with a large pinkish-white head. Quite yeasty with plenty of coriander, a bit of raspberry juice, more yeast and wet bread dough. Medium-ish body, fluffy effervescence. The berries and fruit juice take over, leaving only small amounts of yeast and a bit of a cardboard note; alcopop sweet with no bitterness and a fake fruity finish. Gross.

Bottle. Pours pinkish red, with a fluffy pink head. Soft maltand artificial berry fruit aroma. Flavor is sweet with strawberry note. Finish is short and a little peppery. It’s a good beer for what is supposed to be.
When you have all of these great, sweet fruit beers coming out of Belgium, that really puts this beer in perspective.  The lowest common denominator in comparison.

Canette 250ml. De couleur rosée et voilée. Nez fruité sucré (sirop de framboises) avec des notes de blé et de pain. Moyennement ronde en bouche avec un pétillement moyen ainsi qu’une texture aux notes sirupeuses fruitées. Goût fruité sucré (sirop de framboises, présent en arrière goût toute la gorgée) avec de faibles notes de levures fruitées (notes d’agrumes) lors de l’entrée en bouche auquel se rajoute de notes de pain et de blé. Post-goût moyen, composé d’un léger goût fruité (framboises) avec de faibles traces herbeuses.

[750ml bottle from Asda, High Wycombe] Pours a slightly murky, rather sickly pink colour with a large pale pink head.  Artifical raspberry syrup flavour at first, but some real raspberry (!!) does emerge as you drink it.  It’s generally pretty sweet, although this is balanced to a certain extant (ie not quite enough) by a slight sour fruit note and a surprisingly light & refreshing mouthfeel.  It’s not as bad as I expected, and at times is almost fun - although not fun enough to have again... it’s very definitely an alcopop, but at least the kids won’t get too drunk on it at 3%.
Drinkable. Taste like hoegaarden mixed with light raspberry juice. Nothing special nice light barely beer, beer.

Didn’t like this much, but then again I’m not much of a Hoegaarden fan either. Seems like they just tossed some fruit juice into the wack flavour of a regular Hoegaarden. Bit of a chemical twang at the end. Pours pink. Good thing it was a small can, at least.

Cannette 250ml. Couleur rose pamplemousse, mousse rose aérienne ayant une bonne tenue. Arôme de framboise un peu artificielle, blé?, légère acidité, agrumes. Goût de framboise, jujube, beaucoup trop sucrée. Carbonation élevée, corps moyen.

Cannette 250 ml. 3%. Couleur rose voilée, mousse roseâtre. Arôme de fruits, agrumes, levure et un peu d’herbe. En bouche, framboise sucrées, un peu d’agrumes. Finale parfumée. Correct et rafraîchissante.

750ml cork and cage bottle. Dark pink, hazy with a residue white head. Aroma of sweet fruits. Taste is of sweet red fruits maybe cherries. There is a slight tartness to it. Carbonated on the palate. This is not as sweet as some other fruit beers and is decent enough.
Pretty pink colour with some white fluff on top. Clearly this is not as good as original Hoegaarden, however, it’s a girly drink and I’m a girl, so I liked it well enough.
Sad sad sad Hoegaarden. Pinkish peach colour. Metallic aroma (perhaps from the can), Taste is initially sweet, but then quickly fades to a watery finish. Disappointing.

Pours a pretty pink lemonade colour. Mostly sweet sugary berry aromas...nothing too outstanding....more sweet sugary pink lemonade flavours. Traces of hoegaardens excellent belgian wit...but only an average fruit beer.

Found at my local Métro store, comes in a 4X 250ml cans all wrapped up. Written only 3% ABV, containing concentrated fruit juices, like raspberry, apple, strawberry and elderberry. Pours a cloudy pink colour, looking like a mild grapefruit juice. Its head is light pink, foamy with soapy lacing. The nose seems quite tarty with the raspberry juice and witbier yeast. The mouthfeel is not tarty though. Just like watered-down juice with just a tad of stickiness. The taste is pretty good and refreshing, with a nice mix of the fruit juices and the mild citrus from the regular witbier. Not bad at all, but wish we could have the higher alcohol content, to have more taste, less sweetness.

Hazy dark pink coloured beer with a small white head. Very sweet aroma, very very sweet sticky artificial flavour. (Bottle 25cl/ Can 25cl) I’ve also rated the 0,0 one. 2/3/2/1/2 total 1.0 Aroma is even worst, the rest is pretty much the same. (Bottle 25cl)
Bottle @ Monk’s Wallingatan. Pink colour without head. Raspberry aroma. Flavour is sweet, raspberry. Somewhat artificial. Doesn’t feel like a genuine fruit beer.

Une canette de 25 cl acheté chez l’épicier du coin.  Une robe de pamplemousse rose et une tête blanchâtre qui présente des signes de résistance.  Un nez de framboise, d’acide citrique, de blé et de notes plus douces.  Des saveurs qui vont dans la même direction.  Des petits fruits légèrement acidulés et légèrement sucrés.  Une bouche qui présente un corps moyen-mince avec un pétillement actif et une texture crémeuse.  Une finale fruitée qui présente un caractère synthétique.  Un breuvage fruité qui est loin d’être déplaisant.

250ml Can. Sweet Raspberry comes strong. Faint hint of dry grass. Red/Orange with pink hues. Looks appealing but you wouldn’t catch me walking around a pub with this in my glass. Very light and easy drinking, actually tastes like fruit but less like beer.

30 cl. bottle @ home, bought @ Mitra. Pours hazy pink with a light pink head. Sweet raspberry aroma. Sweet raspberry taste with some hints of yeast. Not terrible for this type of beer but still not ver good either.
Bottle. Pink colour with a white head. Aroma has berry and citrus notes. Flavor is moderate sweet with raspberries notes. Carbonation is medium to high. Body is light.
Pink coloured beer with a fresh and sweet fruity aroma and sweeter taste. A touch sour in the palate.

Bottle bought in Tesco Extra in Whitfield, Kent for about 3 GBP. Shared with MichaelBruch. Aroma is raspberry combined with yeast, milky pink in colour, low but steady head. Taste is like the raspberry beer you get in Poland (Pilsener combined with raspberry syrup). Not that artifical like it may sound, but way too sweet anyway. Guess it’s a beer for girls ;-)
75cl bottle shared with McTapps. Nose and aroma are raspeberry, well, any berry. Tastes extremely sweet and if it wouldn’t be that refreshing this one would be disaster. But it’s OK at all. Just OK.

Large Champagne style bottle bought in Tescos. Colour is bright red/pink, big bubbling white head. Nose is fresh raspberries, wheat malt, syrup. Taste is very syrupy sweet, with raspberries, and then some softer wheat malt character. Too syrupy and sugary sweet for me. Body is light and fluffy though. Finish is too sweet and touch cloying.
Canned 25cl. Raspberry showing up in the nose which is quite inviting. Very sweet. Cardboard and metal appearing in the taste. Poor finish. I enjoyed the nose a lot more than the taste.
25 cl bottle in Brussles. Red beer with a big pink head. Rapsberry aroma, fresh. Sweet raspberry flavour. Nice but not a beer in my book...

#1120
 Machen wirs kurz und bündig: Dieses Getränk ist kein Bier! Es sieht nicht so aus, es riecht nach Himbeer-Götterspeise und es ist auch genauso ultra-süß! Die Flasche ist so schlecht wie schlicht und der Inhalt könnte als alkoholfreies Getränk glatt als Ahoi-Brause durchgehen, igitt :-(
	
Test vom 10.6.2008, Gebinde: Glasflasche 	Noten: 3,4,3,2,3,3 - 3,00

i LOVE this fruit, so i had to try this one.
what i was expecting : a kriek, but than the taste of this fruit .
what it was : it looked like i expected ( pink, no real foam) but it just tasted so chemicaly. not a fan of wheatbeer, and basicly this is just than with some fruitjuice mixed. its not realy as sweet as i expected neither, wich is weird .. not sour, dont be mistaken. just realy hoegaarden with some fruitjuice...
Haze red with a low white topping. Very sweet and sparkling, almost like a soda. There is still some recognizable hops behind it, but the sweetness clearly overpowers.
Good aroma, appearance, taste and palate. Decent, memorable. Rated from the bottle.
Bottle. Pale pink colorwith a white/reddish head. Sweet raspberry aroma. Very sweet raspberry flavor, sugary, some strawberries. Too sweet.

Bottle 25 cl from the brouwery. Pours hazy pink with a pale pink fluffy head. Aroma is sweet raspberries a bit wheaty and yeasty. Flavor is acidy sourish raspberries,sweet and a bit astringent and nicely bitter. Mu h better than the lemon one. Finishes sweet bitterush and with nice fresh touch of raspberries.

Bottle. Pours a nice light pinkish red, with a bubbly pale pink head. Soft malt, light artificial berry fruit on the nose. Palate is light and spritzy, wit sweetness with a soft juicy strawberry note. Finish is short and a little peppery. It’s not awful, just not great.

Rating #739, bottle from Fish N’ Beer
Unclear light red beer, head could be better. Looks like a Fanta Pink Grape. Aroma has fresh citrus fruits and malts. Not much different than any other wit, and a bit dull aroma. The flavor on the other hand, is fresh citrus, sweetness, raspberry, wheat, light bitter and very light alcohol. A bit liqourice-like finish even. Tastes really delicious! Medium thickness, lively and refreshing carbonation. The flavor is really nice, but the beer lacks in other characteristics, especially the aroma.

Baclog june 2009, Kortrijk- bottle at bar.
Intense fruity, light body & light to medium complexity
I did enjoy it at the time

A - 1 finger light pink head. raspberry beer color. Head subsides quickly to quarter finger. Really nice head lacing. SRM of 8



S - smell is very light malts. Slight fruit scent very light.



T - weird. For sure tropical fruits. Not too great. Fake candy cherries and grapes. Artificially flavoured really weak syrup. Idk. It’s deinkabek but in a Sam Adams cherry wheat sort of way.



M - 50/50 carbonation. Light body. Very sweet candy finish.



O – 50/100. It’s not great. I finished it but would never have this again.
250ml bottle. Berries aromas. pours reddish colour, with some vanishing head, no lacing. Liht body and lively carbonation. Taste is really berry sweet, with some tartness. Palate saturating one.
750ml corked bottle from b&m Chester-le-Street. Bright pink-red in colour with a sweet medicinal raspberry/strawberry fruity flavour, slight tartness and a very dry biscuity finish.

Die Schaumkrone ist ganicht mal schlecht. Geschmacklich fruchtig beerig mit künstlich süßen Eindruck, etwas zuckrig. Fazit: Für daswas es darstellen soll ok, mir gefällts aber nicht so gut.
	
Test vom 14.3.2009, Gebinde: Glasflasche 	Noten: 8,7,8,7,8,8 - 7,70

25cl brown bottle drank 5 days before its Best before Date, 17th Aug 2008.

Poured into a ’Mort Subite’ flute.

Cloudy, murky blood orange colour with a head that has a hint of redness in its makeup. A lot of carbonisation rising through the cloud to the head.

Raspberry aroma, mixed with other red berries and sweet grapefruit. A fairly sweet smell, but not overally sickly.

Aimed at the young/female side of the market, I am not sure the old brewery owners would have made such an obvious ’alco-pop’ style beer. The sweetness of the aroma carries on through to the taste, but this time it is a bit sickly and one small bottle is enough for me. The other three in the pack were given to Ladies to try and they all enjoyed them.

Mouthfeel is fine, if you like sugared fruit juice with bubbles. I didn’t really take to it.

Different and sweet, not my ’Cup of Tea’.
floral, roasty, cooked vegetables, raisin, red, sparkling, minimal head, heavy cloying sweetness, lightly bitter, lightly sour, light body, thin feel, fizzy,
